contentList.content: When an enemy hits an ally within [1], reduce the damage by 1d10 + Your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. You must be able to see the attacker.
You can see normally through magical darkness.
You ignore disadvantage from attacking with a ranged weapon within [1]. You also gain a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">ranged weapon attacks</LSTag>.
You gain one superiority dice and learn the Riposte maneuver from the Battle Master subclass.
You learn the Sacred Flame and Guidance cantrips. Charisma is your spellcasting modifier for them.
You learn the Shillelagh and Thorn Whip cantrips. Wisdom is your spellcasting modifier for them.

While you are not wearing heavy armor or wielding a shield, your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> increases by 1, your movement speed increases by [1], and your jump distance increases by 50%.
As a bonus action, you can enter a Defensive Stance until your next turn. While in this stance, your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> increases by 1 and you gain an extra Reaction.
Enter a Defensive Stance. While in this stance, your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag> increases by 1 and you gain an extra Reaction.
Deal an additional 2 damage with thrown weapons.
